item.title: Kubernetes volume plugins and Flocker
item.description: Last month I was working with the guys from Jetstack & ClusterHQ developing a plugina for Kubernetes that will allow the people to easily use Flocker there. Yesterday I had the pleasure of sharing the stage with Rimas Mocevicius, Kelsey Hightower & Ivan Pedrazas at the Kubernetes London meetup to present the plugin and show the audience that creating volume plugins for Kubernetes is easier than it looks at the first glance.
